page.title: 05Farms
page.content: Hill Farm cont. house animals and farm machinery. At the time of our visit there were about 20 beef cattle on the premises all itensively farmed. There were 18 heifers also bred as beef cattle.The main breeds were Fresian,Charolais,and Blonde D'Aquataine,which were generally bought as calves ,but the farmer had recently bought a breeding bull and hoped to produce his own calves. Some orphan lambs were kept in one building .These were all bottle fed.Another building housed the barley crushing machine. The main crop was wheat with some winter wheat. The family owned a horse.
